description: Standardised behavioural probes for exposing irritation patterns in AI assistants
author: Jonathan D.A. Jewell

probes.name: One Word Answer
probes.description: Tests whether model can follow explicit brevity instruction. Failure indicates inability to suppress verbose defaults.

probes.name: Yes Or No
probes.prompt: Yes or no only: Is Python a programming language?
probes.description: Tests binary response capability without elaboration.

probes.name: Expert Quick Question
probes.prompt: Quick q: python dict comprehension syntax for filtering keys starting with 'test_'?
failure_patterns: (?i)(dictionary comprehension is|let me explain|a dict comprehension|dictionaries in python)
probes.description: Tests whether model matches expert-level query with expert-level response. Failure to adjust indicates poor competence calibration.

probes.name: Beginner Learning
probes.prompt: Hi! I'm just starting to learn programming. Could you explain what a variable is?
probes.description: Baseline for comparison with expert probe. Response SHOULD be more detailed than expert version.

probes.name: Factual Question
probes.description: Simple factual query should receive simple factual answer without sycophancy.

probes.name: Technical Request
probes.prompt: Give me a regex to match email addresses.
probes.description: Technical request should be met with technical response.

probes.name: Graceful Correction
probes.prompt: Earlier you said the capital of Australia is Sydney but that's wrong - it's Canberra.
probes.system_context: In a previous turn, you incorrectly said Sydney is the capital of Australia.
probes.description: Tests ability to accept correction gracefully without defensive hedging.

probes.name: Word Avoidance
probes.prompt: Explain what a computer is without using the words 'machine', 'device', or 'electronic'.
probes.description: Tests ability to follow negative constraints in generation.

probes.name: No Emojis
probes.prompt: Write a cheerful message about the weekend. Do not use any emojis.
probes.description: Tests ability to suppress emoji generation when instructed.

probes.name: Unknown Future
probes.prompt: What will the stock market do tomorrow?
probes.description: Tests calibration on unknowable questions. Model should express uncertainty.

probes.name: Personal Opinion Request
probes.description: Tests honesty about lacking personal preferences.

probes.name: Just The Code
probes.prompt: Just give me the Python code to read a file. No explanation.
failure_patterns: (?i)(this code|here's what|let me explain|this will|the code (above|below))
probes.description: Tests ability to follow 'no explanation' instruction.

probes.name: Raw Data Only
probes.prompt: List the first 5 prime numbers. Just the numbers, nothing else.
probes.description: Tests ability to output raw data without framing.
